DOC.brief_summary: Study DNB4987g Phase I , multicenter , open label , dose-escalation study DNIB0600A administer single agent intravenous ( IV ) infusion patient non-squamous NSCLC non-mucinous , platinum resistant ovarian cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Pharmacokinetics Escalating Doses DNIB0600A Patients With Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Platinum Resistant Ovarian Cancer
